thread.title: BRIEF-MPLX LP Says Entered Into Amendment To Issue And Sell Common Units Representing Limited Partner Interests

title: BRIEF-MPLX LP Says Entered Into Amendment To Issue And Sell Common Units Representing Limited Partner Interests

organizations.name: sell common units representing limited partner interests reuters

text: March 13, 2018 / 9:32 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-MPLX LP Says Entered Into Amendment To Issue And Sell Common Units Representing Limited Partner Interests Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 13 (Reuters) - Mplx Lp: * MPLX LP SAYS ENTERED INTO AMENDMENT TO ISSUE AND SELL COMMON UNITS REPRESENTING LIMITED PARTNER INTERESTS IN PARTNERSHIP OF UP TO $1.74 BILLION * MPLX LP SAYS ON MARCH 13, CO, GENERAL PARTNER ENTERED INTO A THIRD AMENDED AND RESTATED DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2Gq0uu3 ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
